The following packages have either been added or updated since the release of the Skunkware 7 CD.

DateUpdated/NewPackageDescription
03-Apr-98 new aalib aalib - ascii graphics library
03-Apr-98 new bb bb - really cool aalib demo
03-Apr-98 new nedit NEdit - Motif GUI text editor
30-Mar-98 new xaos XaoS - Fast interactive real-time fractal zoomer/morpher
07-Mar-98 updated xdoom Improved audio, xdlaunch and bug fixes
05-Mar-98 new xearth Planet earth root window
02-Mar-98 updated xpdf X11 PDF viewer
24-Feb-98 new mpg123 MPEG audio layer 3 player
18-Feb-98 updated lxrun Lxrun version upgrade
18-Feb-98 updated xacc X Accountant version upgrade
18-Feb-98 updated xdoom TrueColor support and bug fixes
13-Feb-98 new enscript Text to postscript converter
13-Feb-98 new cpio GNU cpio
13-Feb-98 new fileutils GNU File Utilities
13-Feb-98 new mc Midnight Commander
12-Feb-98 new xacc X Accountant
